Manifest - USB Printers

The usbPrinters manifest property declares which USB printers are supported by an app using the $(ref:printerProvider) API.

Sample manifest.json

{
  "name": "My printer {{platform}}",
  "usb_printers": {
    "filters": [
      // This app can print to the Nexus One and any printer made by Google.
      { "vendorId": 6353, "productId": 19985 },
      { "vendorId": 6353, "interfaceClass": 7 }
    ]
  },
  ...
}

Reference

{{+partials.manifest_type type:apis.apps.extensionsManifestTypes.byName.UsbPrinters/}}
